scrybes.desc:
Summons creatures back from the graveyard to not only make her minions work to death, but past it.
**Unburial:
[/b]For the cost of a bone, Grimora may draw out of their graveyard instead of their main or side deck.
**Postmortem Doula:
[/b]Once per game: Choose a friendly creature that perished. Create a duplicate of this in your hand.
scrybes.name: Grimora
scrybes.title: Deadly Matriarch

scrybes.desc:
The poor moth who got too close to the truth.
Controls the opponent and manipulates their luck to get the upper hand.
 
**Frozen Marrow:
[/b]The first card to die each turn summons an Ice Flow. Whenever you destroy an Ice Flow, gain +1 hammer use.
 
**Mullinagain:
[/b]Once per game: You may discard your hand and draw that many cards.
scrybes.name: Kaycee
scrybes.title: Intrepid Investigator

scrybes.desc:
**Leshy, scrybe of beasts[\b]
aadhgfgaa, aa. Hhh?Abhgfj
lorem ipsum, etc. etc.
scrybes.name: Royal

scrybes.desc:
Sawyer's noble sacrifice earned him some loyalty- Whether he likes it or not.
 
**Last Remains:
[/b]When you play a canine, gain 1 bone.
 
**Fetch:
[/b]Once per turn, 4 bones: All freindly canines gain +1/+0.
scrybes.name: Sawyer
scrybes.title: Perfect Martyr

scrybes.desc:
Guardian of the forest and oft the welcomer to the scrybe islands.
Reccomended for beginners.
**Gamemaster:
[/b]Leshy starts with 1 extra card in his starting hand. However, Leshy's deck must be 4 cards larger.
**Mortua Memoria:
[/b]Once pre game: choose a card. That card perishes.
scrybes.name: Leshy
scrybes.title: Druidic Photographer

scrybes.desc:
Perpetually encompanied by a scattering of beasts as he performs the noble task of gold mining.
Reccomended for those looking for a variation on leshy's gameplay.
 
**Treasured Partner:
[/b]The prospector starts with a bloodhound in their opening hand.
 
**Gold Fever:
[/b]Once per game: all enemy cards perish and become Gold Nuggets.
scrybes.name: Prospector
scrybes.title: Guardian of the Forest

scrybes.desc:
The gormless angler, whose hook can catch even the most elusive of foes.
 
**Sinker:
[/b]End of turn: Cards that have been in the backline for more than one turn take 1 damage.
 
**Hook:
[/b]Choose a card, and it becomes hooked. That card cannot move, including moving to the frontlines. You may only hook one card at a time.
scrybes.name: Angler

scrybes.desc: likely reserved for Mr. Egg's idea.
scrybes.name: Trapper

scrybes.desc:
Makes the most of their viscous form with a cheery disposition and an insatiable lust to learn.
 
**Liquid Bulwark:
[/b]All your cards have the Mighty Leap effect. Existing cards with MightyLeap gain +0/+1 instead.
 
**Creative Liscense:
[/b]Once per game: choose a card in hand and duplicate it.
scrybes.name: Goobert
scrybes.title: Sticky Denizen

scrybes.desc:
Strategist who perfers to make sure every card in their deck matters.
Suited towards experienced deckbuilders.
**Compression:
[/b]P03's minimum deck size is 5 cards lower.
**Wild Ride:
[/b]Three times per game, once per turn: rotate all cards on the board clockwise.
scrybes.name: P03
scrybes.title: Mechanized Mastermind

scrybes.desc:
put flavor text here
 
**Digital Insight:
[/b]when you gain a card, that card gains +0/+1.
 
**Polarize:
[/b]Choose a card: That card becomes conductive. You may not use this ability again while that card remains alive.
scrybes.name: Inspector
scrybes.title: Diligent Investigator
